title: your favorite champion is now a character in brawl
body: take your favorite character and place him in super smash bros brawl. what does he do? think up as many moves as you want ( 1 for the 1 button 1 for the 2 button and so on)

replies.body:
{{champion:150}} 

to lazy to think of a full  move set (probaly just revolves around his spells in league). but seeing how he would transform would be pretty gnarly
Why Brawl? Why not just say Smash Bros?

Noct

Neutral A: Basic autoattack
↑: Uppercut
↓: Downward lunge
→: Forward stab

Neutral B: Umbra Blades, heal 1% per opponent hit.
↑ B: Paranoia, creates a cloud of shadows around him and dashes upwards.
↓ B: Shroud of Darkness, absorbs a projectile and heals
→ B: Duskbringer, deal bonus 1-2% damage on enemies hit by claw

↑ Smash: Upward spin slash
↓ Smash: Sweep, similar to Link's
→ Smash: Forward lunge, if charged, lunge distance increases

Neutral Air: Spin and slash
↑ Air: Stab upwards
↓ Air: Drill downwards
Forward Air: Smack target downward
Back Air: Noct turns around and stabs with both arms

Grab: Unspeakable Horror tether
Pummel: Noct smacks his target
↑ Throw: Noct drags his target into the shadows and launches them up afterwards
↓Throw: Noct slams his target on the floor
Forward Throw: Noct drags his target into the shadows and launches them forward
Back Throw: Noct spins, slashes his target a few times and sends them backwards.

Dash →: Eternum Noct's dash during Paranoia, but short distance
Cliff: Noct sweeps as he gets up
On ground: Noct spins and slashes as he gets up
